mapper.select: SELECT sys_notice.id as noticeId, sys_notice.title, sys_notice.type, sys_notice.priority, sys_notice.release_time, sys_user_notice.read_flag, sys_user_notice.star_flag, release_user.nickname AS releaseUser FROM sys_notice LEFT JOIN sys_user_notice ON sys_user_notice.notice_id = sys_notice.id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS release_user ON release_user.id = sys_notice.release_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT sys_notice.id, sys_notice.title, sys_notice.type, sys_notice.status, sys_notice.priority, sys_notice.content, sys_notice.release_time, create_user.nickname AS createUser, release_user.nickname AS releaseUser FROM sys_notice LEFT JOIN sys_user AS create_user ON create_user.id = sys_notice.create_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS release_user ON release_user.id = sys_notice.release_id WHERE sys_notice.id = #{id} AND sys_notice.del_flag = '0'
